channel.title: Keep track of Telenims accounts to be deleted
channel.description:
So we can see what accounts he logs in from now:
[s]dongs90210 having_fun_tro bogtung[/s] fun-e-nuff

item.title: Keep track of Telenims accounts to be deleted
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

Moparisthebest:

There was a UDP flood against the moparisthebest.com IP, taking the whole server off the network, which is why everything went down. When the moparisthebest.com IP was null routed at the switch, everything else came back up, but the auth url was still set for moparisthebest.com, so it didn’t work either. It now points at localhost, so it won’t ever break again for that reason.

hmmmmm i wonder who rage quit and did that my guess telenim lol

Read full topic
item.source: Keep track of Telenims accounts to be deleted

item.title: Keep track of Telenims accounts to be deleted
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

There was a UDP flood against the moparisthebest.com IP, taking the whole server off the network, which is why everything went down. When the moparisthebest.com IP was null routed at the switch, everything else came back up, but the auth url was still set for moparisthebest.com, so it didn’t work either. It now points at localhost, so it won’t ever break again for that reason.

Read full topic
item.source: Keep track of Telenims accounts to be deleted

It also crashed again before, I’m noticing the forums are starting to go down everyday now? (With the mc server).[/quote]It had to do with the downtime of moparisthebest.com, all fixed MITB said

item.title: Keep track of Telenims accounts to be deleted
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

It only works if the account is activated, before it didn’t have to be, now it does, so search should work.

This is his latest account, I’m waiting until it is activated to delete it:
http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=531614

edit:
ok, I deleted that one too

edit:
deleted his 6th account for the day, but now I have to go, my advice would just be to keep kicking him from the server every few minutes, like:
/kick trotrotro having fun yet?

Read full topic
